posts.title: The 'cast Heard Round the World
posts.content:
The one that kicked it all off. Sort of. Andy and I had high hopes for this podcast, and it's interesting to see where we are and where we had hoped to be. I do love that I was so adamant about calling this "Episode 0" and it still ended up being "Episode 1".

Side note: I mention transcendental numbers and then include the square-root of something. Unless that something was also a transcendental number, then my example was wrong. A square root is not a transcendental number in itself.

**WARNING**
This was recorded before Andy and I knew what we were doing with the mics. Levels kind of suck. They get better though! Listen at your own risk

posts.title: Jack Thompson
posts.content:
Andy felt that we were giving Jack Thompson too much psuedo-air time. As such, he decided to censor out JT's name.
That said, good old Jackie plays a relatively minor part in this episode.

**WARNING**
We still hadn't gotten the microphones working too well in this episode. Listen at the risk of your own ears.

posts.content: Maybe I'll put something here, someday.

posts.title: Episode 8
posts.content: What is greatness? What sort of things can be called "Great". Listen in to find out!

posts.title: Episode 9
posts.content:
Election day! We spend a little time talking about politics (not much, honest). And then there's some stuff about buying a laptop.
Also, this is where Andy starts adding a pre-recorded intro to the cast. Too many complaints about our singing

posts.title: Episode 12
posts.content: Christmas music!! In this episode, Andy and I fight out or intro music disagreement. Other than that, lots of news from thanksgiving.

posts.title: Episode 13
posts.content:
Andy and I capitulated and bought our Wiis.
This is also the first episode with what has become our standard introduction.

posts.title: Late nights
posts.content:
A midnight special edition of the podcast!
Yes, Dave have hung out with witches. No, he has not partaken in any rituals.
We really go back to our name on this one of RANDOM. Hurrah! Rejoice in the renewal. Random Topic: Reasoning behind the Fellowship of the Rings.

posts.title: Important
posts.content: This is one of my favorite episodes. Zach Wigal joins us live over the web to tell us his story. The end result of all this is the Gamers Outreach Foundation

posts.title: It's UP!
posts.content:
Firstly, and most importantly, Episode 48 is up. Shownotes are, as per usual, not. I would also like to direct your attention once again to the little button above that says "forums." The new forums are up and sort of active. We need YOU to sign up and help them become better than they used to be.
Next, I regret to inform you that there will probably be a bit of a delay for Episode 49. Andy and I both have finals in the coming weeks, and we need some time to prepare the. There is also the fact that Andy has gone through yet another car. For anyone keeping score, that's 3 cars in a month that have in some fashion DIED while Andy was driving. Due to these complications, there probably won't be a recording this week. Sorry.

posts.title: Ah Ha!
posts.content:
We've returned! Huzzah!
And with out triumphant (if temporary) return, Episode 49
However.... we'll be gone again shortly. We apologize for the delay. It's pretty funny too, cause almost no one's going to actually SEE this page, or this post. A) It assumes I've finally PUBLISHED this website. B) It assumes someone's going back through and READING my web posts. I'm tempted to do what Dover of the Monday Night Crew did, and give a reward to whoever finds this.... nah.

posts.title: We're Back
posts.content:
We're back. Finally. It's been about two months since we've recorded, but Andy and I have finally started to get back onto a regular schedule.
Anyways, Episode 50 is here in all it's wonderful glory. This is the first new episode of our new recording schedule, with any luck we'll be returning to a weekly podcast. Sorry again for the drought of episodes.
In slightly sadder news. Gary Gygax, hero to many, passed away recently. I have seen many jokes about his death, which I suppose is just "our" way of honoring him. His creation helped thousands of geeks and nerds find something to do, and he will not soon be forgotten. Rest In Piece Mr. Gygax, and may the dice always roll in your favor.

posts.title: Lotta new old programs
posts.content:
Episode 51 is up!
The sequel plague hitting the movie theaters seems to be hitting software as well. Thankfully, software tends to IMPROVE with new versions, as opposed to movies...
This site is almost set. I need the forums, and massive testing. After that, it should be pretty much active.
Huzzah!

posts.title: More and more to do
posts.content:
i don't know why I'm working so hard on keeping this site active. I've still got a lot to do on here... But, more and more is getting done, so that's a good thing.
Episode 52 is up. Andy's been working really hard to get these episodes into exactly 1 hour. I'm not entirely sure why, but he is. Whatever, it's cool.
